name: "Oblivion"
description:
You're name is Orion, and you're mission is to save her.

But you don't feel like doing that for once, you want to go somewhere different. Maybe to make yourself feel better, or maybe just to forget. Forget everything.

You're tired of staying in this oblivion,  but you also don't want to leave it. Now, all you want is to go home; but there is so many homes to go to now.

Which home do you want to go to?

((Game created by Flower Child on 2019)) ((Game includes blood, gore, and suicidal topics, play at your own risk.))
